job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: R1 RCM Inc is a leading provider of technologyenabled revenue cycle management services which transform and solve challenges across health systems hospitals and physician practices Headquartered in Chicago R1 is a publiclytraded organization with employees throughout the US and international locationsbrbrOur mission is to be the one trusted partner to manage revenue so providers and patients can focus on what matters most Our priority is to always do what is best for our clients patients and each other With our proven and scalable operating model we complement a healthcare organizations infrastructure quickly driving sustainable improvements to net patient revenue and cash flows while reducing operating costs and enhancing the patient experiencebrbrThe Machine Learning Engineer will support the development and delivery of machine learningbased solutions to further this goal at scale This person will be working with a team of Data Engineers and Data Scientists to turn healthcare data into actionable insights and predictions to power a nextgenerational Revenue Cycle and enhance our Product offeringbrbrIn this role the successful candidate will have a strong background in machine learning enjoy applying theory to develop realworld applications and have a passion for using technology to improve the healthcare ecosystembrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul learning algorithms amp solutions to enhance R1s Products and Operationsli liProductionize machine learning algorithms and pipelines at scale and support integration with other R1 Products via APIsli liParticipate in the full software development cycle design develop QA deploy experiment and analyzeli brbrulstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongul liBachelors degree in Computer Science Math Statistics Engineering or other related technical field or equivalent experienceli liStrong knowledge of Python amp SQL programming OOP concepts design patterns version control and database systemsli liAbility to use programming language to implement entire lifecycle of machine learningli liSome professional or academic experience in data science data engineering machine learning and APIbased solution architectureli liProfessional or academic experience with data science libraries like NumPy SciPy Pandas ScikitLearn MLlib etcli liProfessional or academic experience in implementing and optimizing deep learning models using frameworks like Tensorflow Pytorch etcli liPractical understanding of core MLStatisticsCS principlesli liStrong communication skills to own and share strategy Apache OpenNLP etc li liExperience with healthcare andor revenue cycle management applicationsli liKnowledge of the healthcare data and integration standards eg EDI FHIR HL7li liExperience with Cloud computing infrastructure like Azure AWS or GCP etcli brulWorking in an evolving healthcare setting we use our shared expertise to deliver innovative solutions Our fastgrowing team has opportunities to learn and grow through rewarding interactions collaboration and the freedom to explore professional interestsbrbrOur associates are given valuable opportunities to contribute to innovate and create
